title: Apple Says It Will Fix Software Problems Blamed for Making iPhone 15 Models Too Hot to Handle
description: The iPhone 15 phones during an announcement of new products on the Apple campus in Cupertino, Calif., on Sept. 12, 2023. (Jeff Chiu/AP Photo)

title: Open AI Exec Warns AI Is ‘Extremely Addictive,’ Humanity Could Become ‘Enslaved’
description: NEW YORK, NEW YORK - APRIL 19: Mira Murati, Chief Technology Officer, OpenAI, speaks onstage during Fast Company's first in-person event to honor 2023's Most Innovative Companies at Hall Des Lumieres on April 19, 2023 in New York City. (Photo by Eugene Gologursky/Getty Images)
